h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
img_above_text:
# Mind Core
Mind Cores, like Blood of the Iron Bull, are one of the rarest Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong and it is vital that you find as many of them as possible to be able to provide passive upgrades to your stats, health, damage, and defense.
## Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
Below, you can find a list of all the Mind Core locations in the game's first two chapters:
### Mind Core Location 9
The next Mind Core is actually obtained by speaking with Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple \- Cellar Shrine area.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically related to the quest for finding Mind Cores, which are rare crafting materials. The character is shown in a dimly lit, temple-like environment, standing before an incense offering station with a prompt to "Offer Incense." This setting is likely the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar Shrine area, where players can interact with Xu Dog to obtain the ninth Mind Core. The image serves to illustrate the location and the in-game action required to progress in this quest.
